title: 1.12的命令
txt_content:
1.8中这些还可以显示/tellraw @a {text:"Hello World",color:dark_red}复制代码/tellraw @p {text:"XXX",color:yellow,underlined:true,clickEvent:{action:open_url,value:"http://www.XXX"}}复制代码到了 1.12 就显示 js命令   没有显示
求 1.12的格式

replies.author: 极光战神伍
replies.txt_content: /tellraw @a {"text":"Hello World","color":"dark_red"}复制代码/tellraw @p {"text":"XXX","color":"yellow","underlined":"true","clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"http://www.XXX"}}复制代码到1.9以上tellraw里的所有词组都需要添加引号。

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content: nbt部分，没有被围的那几个英文词组两边用"围上，试试...

replies.author: 0ojixueseno0
replies.txt_content: 试试将指令改为/tellraw @p {"text":"XXX","color":"yellow","underlined":"true","clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"http://www.XXX"}}复制代码

replies.author: 0ojixueseno0
replies.txt_content:
0ojixueseno0 发表于 2018-6-15 19:01

emmm打开回复的时候忘了发了...过了好久想起来发了有人回答了。。尴尬
